Meet Janine

Meet Janine! In her fifth year with Halcyon, she is currently finishing off her degree in Elementary Education at U of R!

Her favourite choral piece is called “Cells Planets” by Erika Lloyd and her favourite moments in choir include singing Karl Jenkins’ “The Armed Man”, performing in our last Broadway show and, of course, eating the amazing snacks we have every week at rehearsal!

Image courtesy of Andrea Norberg Photography
